meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tara O'Byrne Beth Schoenbach Dave Mattingly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7812.

td.p: Tara O'Byrne, a senior advisor on aviation security from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Beth Schoenbach, a communications director from Washington, D.C.
Dave Mattingly, a director of technology from Old Forge, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,800)

tr.td: IT'S ABOUT THE MONEY
BIBLE BOOK ABBREVIATIONS
2-TERM CABINET OFFICERS
THIS IS ONLY A TEST
CELEBRITY MEMOIRS
MEATY LANGUAGE
